name: Shennong
temple_description:
Shennong was China's Goddess in charge of medicine and agriculture, and was revered as one of the three ancient emperors.
She tasted all the herbs, taught mankind the art of healing poisons, and helped them overcome diseases; she even invented farming tools, diverted water, planted grains, and helped mankind overcome famine. She was a powerful divinity that symbolizes peace, harvest and wisdom.

active_skills.name: Curse of Herbs
active_skills.effect: Add Poison effect, causing enemy to lose 3% current HP for 3 rounds
